casebody.data:
LEVER BROTHERS COMPANY, Complainant, v. COOK, SWAN & YOUNG CORPORATION, Defendant. Percy L. YOUNG and Harold W. Young, Interveners-Appellants, v. Mark W. MACLAY et al., Appellees. No. 180. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 4, 1932. Kohlman, Austrian & Lance, of New York City (Saul J. Lance, of New York City, of counsel), for reeeivers-appellees Mark W. Maelay et al. Franklin & Hicks, of New York City (Hamilton Hicks, of New York City, of counsel), for interveners-appellants.

'Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order and. decree affirmed.
